seriesStmt.title: František Ignác Antonín Tůma: A thematic catalogue of his works

annot.p: This work comprises the same Gloria as TumW A.6. @Peschek1956 also mentions a copy in A-GÖ, which has not been documented by @Riedel1979 and is currently (2024-08) undiscoverable.
S coro (2x; 6, 6), A coro (2x; 6, 6), T coro (2x; 6, 5), B coro (2x; 6, 5), vl 1 (4), vl 2 (4), vla (4), vlne (4), org (2x; 5, 8)

titlePage.label: [wrapper]
titlePage.p: Miſsa in D a Capella | a | 4tuor Vocibus | Violetta | Tromboni 2. | con | Organo et Violone | Par Monsieur Thuma.

annot.p: S coro (7), A coro (7), T coro (7), B coro (7), trb 1 (7), trb 2 (7), vl (4), vlne (7), org (7)
vl in the hand of Pasterwiz, remaining parts by unidentified hand

titlePage.label: [wrapper]
titlePage.p: Miſsa in dmol | á | 4 Voci. | Violetta | 2 Tromponi | Organo et Violone | Del Sign. Thuma

annot.p: S coro (7), A coro (7), T coro (7), B coro (7), trb 1 (6), trb 2 (5), vl (6), vlne (5), org (7)
at end of each part: “O: A: M: D: Gl.”

titlePage.label: [p. 1]
titlePage.p: Missa in D. a Capella. | a | 4tuor Vocibus. | con | Organo. | Par Monsieur Thuma.

physMedium.p: printed staff paper (C. A. KLEMM. | A. N° 6), 20 staves (6 mm)

annot.p: from the collection of Otto Schmid
The page containing the description of this work is missing in @HerzogenburgInvA (between p. 100 and 101).
